channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14072] Nullpointerexception in running mapreduce with toolrun and exteded class TableInputFormat
item.description:
Running mapreduce with extended class
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TableInputFormat , and using toolrun ,nullpointerexception is coming from getTable().getName().The code was working if previous version of hbase.

Its working if we call initialize(context) inside getSplits method.
item.summary: Nullpointerexception in running mapreduce with toolrun and exteded class TableInputFormat

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment: Mind posting the exact command run as well as the stacktrace you see?
